name: htbhf-applicant-web-ui
version_notice: Patch versions are incremented by Travis (in tag_version.sh via .travis.yml) - never manually increment the patch version

scripts.start:dev: npm run build && nodemon $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION src/web -e js,json,html,njk
scripts.test: cross-env LOG_LEVEL=silent CLAIMANT_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:8090 SESSION_DETAILS_PORT=8081 OS_PLACES_URI=http://localhost:8090 npm-run-all build test:lint test:unit:coverage test:fail_if_test_only_found -p -r start test:session-details test:browser
scripts.test:acceptance: mkdir -p build/reports && cross-env TESTS=acceptance cucumber-js src/test/acceptance/features/ --tags 'not @ignore' --require 'src/test/common/steps/**/*.js' --require 'src/test/acceptance/config' --require 'src/test/common/timeout.js' -f json:build/reports/acceptance-report.json
scripts.test:acceptance-no-wiremock: mkdir -p build/reports && cross-env TESTS=acceptance cucumber-js src/test/acceptance/features/ --tags 'not @ignore' --tags 'not @RequiresWiremock' --require 'src/test/common/steps/**/*.js' --require 'src/test/acceptance/config' --require 'src/test/common/timeout.js' -f json:build/reports/acceptance-report.json
scripts.test:acceptance:debug: mkdir -p build/reports && cross-env SESSION_DETAILS_PORT=8081 OS_PLACES_URI=http://localhost:8090 TESTS=acceptance node --inspect-brk=9229 $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION node_modules/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js src/test/acceptance/features/ --tags 'not @ignore' --require 'src/test/common/steps/**/*.js' --require 'src/test/acceptance/config' --require 'src/test/common/timeout.js' -f json:build/reports/acceptance-report.json
scripts.test:smoke:test: mkdir -p build/reports && cross-env TESTS=smoke cucumber-js src/test/smoke/features/ --require 'src/test/common/steps/**/*.js' --require 'src/test/smoke/config' -f json:build/reports/smoke-report.json
scripts.test:smoke:debug: mkdir -p build/reports && cross-env TESTS=smoke node $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION node_modules/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js src/test/smoke/features/ --require 'src/test/common/steps/**/*.js' --require 'src/test/smoke/config' -f json:build/reports/smoke-report.json
scripts.test:browser: npm run test:wait && npm run test:htbhf-acceptance-tests && npm run test:startWiremock && npm-run-all -s test:smoke test:accessibility test:acceptance test:acceptance:report test:stopWiremock
